pullrequest.title: Switch to six independent GPS sensor noise models

content.html:
@nkoenig has already fixed them on default in 626fab4 and 1391be0

There is a script called code_check.sh in the tools folder that runs cppcheck and cpplint. It can be invoked from the root of the repository with sh tools/code_check.sh

It's kind of a slow script, so there are some tricks to make it run faster by only checking a subset of the files. For example, the tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -c 0 command can check the files modified by the most recent commit.
